ygData.subject: Re: Neutral base under attack!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Clash was hit in the head. He hadn t expected that. Clash: What? That cannot have happened, I am perfect. But you shall not hit me again. Clash took to the air
ygData.rawEmail:

X-Sender: thecode@...
X-Apparently-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Received: (qmail 86062 invoked from network); 13 Jan 2001 01:58:36 -0000
Received: from unknown (10.1.10.26) by l9.egroups.com with QMQP; 13 Jan 2001 01:58:36 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO pimout1-int.prodigy.net) (207.115.63.77) by mta1 with SMTP; 13 Jan 2001 01:58:35 -0000
Received: from birdboy (A020-0940.TAMP.splitrock.net [63.254.85.178]) by pimout1-int.prodigy.net (8.11.0/8.11.0) with SMTP id f0D1wSa175816 for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Fri, 12 Jan 2001 20:58:29 -0500
Message-ID: <007e01c07d04$442fd320$b255fe3f@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
References: <93m6pe+udl1@...>
Subject: Re: Neutral base under attack!!!!!
Date: Fri, 12 Jan 2001 20:57:57 -0500
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 5.00.3018.1300
X-Mimeole: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V5.00.3018.1300
From: "SOULSTICE" <thecode@...>

Clash was hit in the head. He hadn't expected that.

Clash: What? That cannot have happened, I am perfect. But you shall not hit
me again.

Clash took to the air and swung a wild forearm at Nightlight, blades popping
out from his arms.

(My long battle shall continue with another long piece) Perplex, meanwhile,
was having the best of luck. Serge struck again and again, but couldn't hit
Perplex. Serge started to cry and whine. Perplex stopped to look at Serge.
Serge tried to take the opportunity to hit Perplex, but Perplex moved up and
sliced right through Serge's arm. Perplex landed from his jump. Serge's arm
clattering to the ground. Serge started backing away, but Perplex moved
towards him. Serge started whining again, this was for real. Perplex frowned
in disaproval, he didn't want to kill such a helpless beast, but it looked
like...A streak of anger ran through Perplex. He turned around and looked
back to the ship. Zeni ran back inside. Perplex realized that he must have
been over there the whole time. This anger distracted him and Serge took
advantage, grabbing Perplex in his other hand. Perplex was not a bot of
size, not even decent size. And Serge was large. Not overly large, like
Optimal Optimus, but he was as big as you could go without moding. Serge
laughed diabolically. Perplex pressed to his sides, and forced Serge's hand
open, hanging on and dropping, like as if he was extremely heavy. He tore
off Serge's hand. Serge looked at his missing hand and arm, and started to
retreat backwards again. Perplex briefly considered letting him get away,
slowly walking after him...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 1:04 AM
Subject: Re: Neutral base under attack!!!!!
